title: Missing People
details: 116 000 is the number to call, text or email for advice, support and options if you, or someone you love, goes missing or runs away - itâ€™s free, 24 hour and confidential.  We provide around the clock emotional support for the duration of a disappearance.

title: Crimestoppers
details: Crimestoppers is an independent charity who will not want your name, just your information. Your call will not be traced or recorded and you do not have to go to court or give a statement. If you have any information relating to guns and gangs or any crime you can call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111 or through.

title: National Domestic Violence Helpline
details: (Run in partnership between Women's Aid and Refuge) -, www.womensaid.org.uk or email helpline@womensaid.org.uk

title: UK Missing Persons Bureau
details: We are the UK national and international point of contact for all missing person and unidentified body investigations.
